### What to do if a TMT ion mass changes:

# Load existing reporter converter:
reporter_converter <- PlexedPiper::reporter_converter
# reporter_converter <- reporter_converter[-c(length(reporter_converter))]

# In this example, we want to add a second mass option for all TMT sub-tables except `tmt6` and `tmt10`
reporter_converter$tmt11_new <- dplyr::add_row(
    reporter_converter$tmt11,
    ReporterName = "131C_new",
    ReporterIon = "Ion_131.145",
    .after = 11
)
reporter_converter$tmt16_new <- dplyr::add_row(
    reporter_converter$tmt16,
    ReporterName = "131C_new",
    ReporterIon = "Ion_131.145",
    .after = 11
)
reporter_converter$tmt18_new <- dplyr::add_row(
    reporter_converter$tmt18,
    ReporterName = "131C_new",
    ReporterIon = "Ion_131.145",
    .after = 11
)

# Add this new option back into the reporter converter:
# reporter_converter$tmt11_new_131C <- new_tmt11

# Re-save reporter converter:
save(reporter_converter, file = "../data/reporter_converter.RData")

devtools::build(vignettes = F)
devtools::document()
